title: How to Make a Shanghai Fried Rice

steps.headline: Fluff and spread the cooked rice on a baking tray.
steps.description: Let it cool. Cool completely for best results. This is so the rice dries enough to make a proper, non-mushy fried rice.

steps.headline: Cut the Chinese sausages into thin discs.
Fry the scrambled eggs and cut into strips.
Using a Chinese wok, heat oil.
Add garlic, onion and shrimps for the sauté.
Add the strips of scrambled egg and stir well.
Then add the green peas, lettuce, salt and white pepper or MSG.
Add soy sauce and spring onions, stir well to evenly distribute the ingredients.

text: Fluff and spread the cooked rice on a baking tray. Let it cool. Cool completely for best results. This is so the rice dries enough to make a proper, non-mushy fried rice. Chop the garlic finely.  Chop the spring onion.  Cut the Chinese sausages into thin discs.  Fry the scrambled eggs and cut into strips.  Slice the lettuce into strips  Using a Chinese wok, heat oil.  Add garlic, onion and shrimps for the sauté.  Add the strips of scrambled egg and stir well.  Then add the green peas, lettuce, salt and white pepper or MSG.  Add soy sauce and spring onions, stir well to evenly distribute the ingredients.
